title: FS: T206 Doc White Portrait SGC 60 SOLD
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Doc White Portrait SGC 60 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Look at the scan, you will be hard pressed to find a nicer one than this. Wasn't going to sell it, but sell it I must. $90 ppd w/del. conf. Paypal (preferred), check, mo all ok. This card will NOT be reduced in price. If it doesn't sell by Sun. night I will list on ebay.
Thanks, Tony

I'll take the Doc White Portrait Tony!

Send me an e-mail and I can send payment
